summary: A poor rickshaw driver finds himself helping a young woman and her son after the woman's husband dies suddenly.
cast: Toshirô Mifune|Hideko Takamine|Hiroshi Akutagawa|Chishû Ryû|Chôko Iida|Haruo Tanaka|Jun Tatara|Kenji Kasahara|Kaoru Matsumoto|Nobuo Nakamura|Ichirô Arishima|Chieko Nakakita|Seiji Miyaguchi|Bokuzen Hidari|Kokuten Kôdô|Yoshio Tsuchiya|Kichijirô Ueda|Yoshio Kosugi|Ikio Sawamura|Senkichi Ômura|Takuzô Kumagai
title: El hombre del carrito
